subject.normal: [Issue 154] New - Remove icon in the 'Add table' wizard displays as 'Rem...' in unix

headers.subject: [Issue 154] New - Remove icon in the 'Add table' wizard displays as 'Rem...' in unix

body.para: https://open-dm-ds.dev.java.net/issues/show_bug.cgi?id=154 Issue #|154 Summary|Remove icon in the 'Add table' wizard displays as 'Rem |...' in unix Component|open-dm-ds Version|current Platform|All OS/Version|Linux URL| Status|NEW Status whiteboard| Keywords| Resolution| Issue type|DEFECT Priority|P3 Subcomponent|mashup-editor Assigned to|nilesh_apte Reported by|harig

2008 ------- Remove icon in 'Add table' wizard displays as 'Rem...' in linux whereas the same icon labelled as 'Remove'.
